duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage and maximize the productivity of the restaurant operations team and direct and coordinate the resources, tasks, requirements, and processes related to the unit’s day-to-day operating budget.
Provide support and hands-on assistance to plan, prepare, oversee, report, and reconcile the unit’s on-going business activities to ensure its commercial success.
Create, lead, and execute food and beverage experiences that exceed guest expectations and maximize revenue while controlling expenses.
